_For general questions please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/orgs/ParallelSSH/discussions).

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. [Minimal reproducible example code](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example).
2. Stack trace or error messages - use `pssh.utils.enable_debug_logger()`

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Actual behaviour**
What actually happened.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional information**
Include version of ``ssh2-python`` and any other relevant information.
